Reviews.Content: Nokia Lumia 521 is playful fun phone with an easy interface. I love the ease of access to the apps and features. The only thing that is a disappointment is that the battery is not lasting past two days. But, still this is a great phone regardless.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Mudassar Mohsin
Reviews.Content: I've been using smart phones for a while,have used HTC 4g (android), Motorola & othersthis is my first Windows phoneEXCELLENTexcept for front camera, this phone has everything most smart phones offerin the price here?? MOST DEFINITELY GREAT VALUEHighly Recommend

Reviews.Title: Wow, a wonderful phone for so little money
Reviews.Author: crocodile bobbies
Reviews.Content: Wow, this phone really is easy to use compared to android phones I have had. It is simple to set up, just likeany other smart phone, but the operating system colors can be changed and the window are easy to understandand it is easy to add a contact. Not so with most android phones.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Cody
Reviews.Content: If you want a good phone for a great price this is it. Has all the apps any more expensive phone would have.

Reviews.Title: Really like this phone
Reviews.Author: douglas martin
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone from Metro PCS for 29 dollars after 20 dollar rebate. When I first got my computer with windows 8.1 I wasn't sure I was going to like 8.1 but after getting used to it I really like the new windows. Now to have a phone with windows 8 and seeing how easy it is to work, I'm glad I bought it. For 29 dollars you can't go wrong. Of course it doesn't  have all the bells and whistles, but if you uses it for just the basics this is a great phone. It's fast, the bluetooth pairs easily, and the speech recognition works perfectly. The only thing I didn't like was the toolbar at the bottom doesn't have a back light but for 29 dollars it's a minor flaw. So if you want a great smart phone for little money this is the one. One other thing is that it's a Nokia and I've always had good luck with that brand.  Update: Now that I've had this phone for over a month I thought I'd give you an update. This was the best 29 dollars I've ever spent. I can't believe what a great phone this is. I usually buy mid priced phones because I'm not a 17 year old that needs to have all the bells and whistles. I could never justify spending 5-6 hundred dollars on a phone, like the saying goes - a fool and his money are soon parted - (Steve Jobs probably will have this put on his grave stone). Getting back to the subject - this phone has everything you'll ever need. People complain about the amount of apps available - how many apps do you need. There are some great apps available and more on the way. The voice recognition is amazing for this priced phone and I can't believe how much i like Windows 8. Windows 8 is so simple to use, I don't think I'll ever go back to android or ios. The only draw back is that it's not a fast web browser, but if your like me, I do all of my web browsing on my computer. So take it from a person who only writes reviews if the product is really good or really bad - you'll love this phone.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 521 - perfect backup for me
Reviews.Author: Happy Cappy
Reviews.Content: First of all this vendor sent this way fast. It was at my door step practically within 30 hours. Thank you! It came packaged in original Tmobile style. All the accessories included. The phone itself is fast in replying to text. The voice command I think is faster than my Note 2. Boo I know but I finally have a back up that is small to fit in my pocket. Love this product. No flash but my back up was meant for other things vs. pics. Thank you again. I would buy from this vendor again should this one come up missing.

Reviews.Title: great cellphone excellent conditions brand new! thanks you.Fast & furious AAA+++
Reviews.Author: Don't work properly "Jaime M Illescas"
Reviews.Content: great cellphone excellent conditions brand new! thanks you.Fast & furious AAA+++ great communication. I will recommend this phone because is a great machine.

Reviews.Title: A pleasant surprise
Reviews.Author: Chandana Sapparapu "Socially Responsible Indi...
Reviews.Content: As a developer, I can feel the stark contrast between a Macbook Pro (SSD, 16GB RAM and a quad-core CPU, nothing less) and a Windows laptop.A Windows phone was unthinkable for me. At the same time, I am smart enough to not spend 600-700$ on a smartphone. My old feature phone was crushed under my car when I forgot to keep my handbag inside. I was waiting for the smartphone prices to come down so that the phone doesn't own me. I was considering Nexus 5, but I saw an ad for this phone for 70$ and after reading a few glowing reviews on Amazon, I felt confident to buy this. It is only 70$, not 700$. I also have an Ipod Touch 4th generation and an IPad 3rd gen. This phone is definitely faster than the Ipod, and pretty decent for email, weather, calendar checking and other daily activities. I am not a power user and I have a feeling that this phone won't get obsolete for me for another two years.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: momof3
Reviews.Content: My first smart phone so I have nothing to compare it with but I love it.  It gets the job done, takes beautiful clear pictures and looks sleek and stylish.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Andy Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: This phone is cheap, slick, and smart. It has great camera effects you can play with BUT it is a windows phone. I give it four stars just because Windows is so behind in the app game.

Reviews.Title: Amazing, Truly amazing!!!!
Reviews.Author: Harold Rivera Valentine
Reviews.Content: This phone is truly amazing, durable, the phone system is perfect. Bought it for college and work. And it has been taking a lot of usage. Still working perfectly.

Reviews.Title: awesome for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: Does everything well, call quality is amazingly clear, camera okay . The navigation is absolutely excellent. And if I wreck it, a new one is $89. Can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: DJD
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these phones for my parents so they could have a smart phone.  They don't use their phones a whole lot so I didn't want to get something like an iphone (which I have and paid $600 for...and incidentally just died after 14 months so I'm pissed!)  Anyways, I digress.  This phone for the price is truly amazing.  It does everything my iphone does.  Why am I paying so much for my stupid iphone when I could do all the same things on this phone?  Well, it doesn't support some of the games I play, but how lame is that? lol!  This phone really does do everything though.  I'm really happy with this purchase and my parents really like the phones.

Reviews.Title: Nokia Lumia 521
Reviews.Author: Anna Clark
Reviews.Content: So far so great. I love this phone.  It syncs perfectly with my windows computer and does everything I need it to.  The phone feels solid, the screen is vivid, and it has all the apps I need.  It's not an iPhone but for the price, it's definitely wonderful.  I also love that since it isn't an iPhone I don't have to worry about dropping it, losing it, scratching the screen...  It's easily replaceable for the price. I used the camera a few times and am excited about the panorama feature.  There is a circle that comes up to help you line up the sequence of images perfectly.

Reviews.Title: amsome
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I love it thought it had a camera on the front but. I love it it what I asked for and more

Reviews.Title: The call quality is better than my $300 phone!
Reviews.Author: applecider
Reviews.Content: The call quality is so great.  I almost think it is impossible to get this clear phone call on t mobile network.  Overall, a phone is about call clarity and battery life.  Nokia is great for these!  The screen is very responsive to touch.  That is great.There are certain features that it is lack, but I am keeping the phone to make clear phone calls.  It is not too big, so I can hold it in my hands when I exercise.  It fit into my lifestyle.Note, I do have a big tablet for more sophiscated task. I don't really use it more than a phone.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Eric Freeman
Reviews.Content: i love this phone. works great have had no problems with it.sound quality is better than old one.all in all good phone.

Reviews.Title: Amazing value smart phone
Reviews.Author: Ally
Reviews.Content: You cannot beat the price of this phone. I like it more than my Samsung Galaxy. The screen resolution isn't great and there is no flash on the camera, but I can live with that for this price. I was surprised that I love the Windows Phone interface, it is easy to use, easy to customize and looks cool. For this price, there is no reason not to buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: sunilm
Reviews.Content: are you Looking for a change? Go for a lumia..Its worth the price and good smart phone at entry level.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Lian-Jene Chien
Reviews.Content: Fantastic upgrade from a non-smart phone into an entry level smartphone, highly recommended for anyone who wants a cheap efficient upgrade. Even better than an iphone 3.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This is a very fast, good looking phone. And for the price its fantastic but the price comes at a price. The lack of front facing camera is inconvenient because I wanted to get into snap chat, al so the back cover gets loose over time if you don't use a case and can make it feel flimsy and cheap. But if you can get over that its wonderful. Very nice screen and very good touch capabilities. Also good sound with loud speakers and is very light. Overall a very nice phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: Best Windows Phone for the price....
Reviews.Author: Richard F.
Reviews.Content: Except for not having a front-facing camera, this phone can work just as a good as any other smartphone. For the price, no wonder its the best selling Windows Phone smartphone on the market. Nokia builds solid phones.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: John Riggins
Reviews.Content: Got the phone in about 3 days and it looks like it has never been touched. graphics is pretty well done for the phone and it flows pretty well with the windows system. Battery life isn't long if you plan to game and such but overall pretty well done

Reviews.Title: Nice Nokia
Reviews.Author: Di
Reviews.Content: This is really a neat little phone, very durable, and easy to hold. The graphics, show up well.  I've had many phones over the years, and will say that this is my fave!

Reviews.Title: best entry phone for the $
Reviews.Author: R. Novak
Reviews.Content: WP has come a long way and this is in my opinion the BEST entry phone you can get. Nokia has delivered the goods yet again...

Reviews.Title: A smartphone that does everything for less than 100 bucks
Reviews.Author: Justin M. Salvato
Reviews.Content: This Windows Phone is a fantastic device.  It's a media player (mp3, music, podcast, videos), a productivity device (Office, Reader), small computer (email, web browser) and a phone!  No flash on the camera or back lit buttons, but Nokia had to take something away to get to this price point.  And even so, it feels like a high end device.  The software is smooth and fast, you can get access to Xbox Music and Video, and there are 100s of thousands of apps in the store!  One more thing, even without the flash on the camera, it takes VERY good photos.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Leesa
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a good windows phone at an affordable price, this is a good choice.  This phone came with a T-Mobile Sim card, wall charger, and, of course, the phone. I have been well pleased with the performance of the phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone for A Excellent Price............
Reviews.Author: Philip Floyd
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about getting this phone because you usually get what you pay for.  Boy was I wrong.  This phone is awesome......I bought this for my gf and now I am thinking of selling my Galaxy to get one of these............SOLID PHONE 4 SURE

Reviews.Title: Love my phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I love the features but still trying to learn how to use the apps. Can't use Google or IPhone Apps but Windows 8 have their own apps to make up for it. I love that I can have access to my documents and pictures that are on my computer. Recommended for those who  are apps savvy

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great phone, does just what it says,I have never had a phone with internet before. Easy to use would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: inexpensive, quality smart phone
Reviews.Author: Herbsworld
Reviews.Content: bought this for my daughter to replace a T mobile phone that died. although I don't have any first hand knowledge of usage, she's pretty happy with the phone. and it would seem to have many features of higher priced phones.

Reviews.Title: For my mom
Reviews.Author: Ann M. Gemmel
Reviews.Content: She is a first time smart phone user, and I think windows phone is easier to pick up than android or ios.  She seems to be handling it just fine!  I like the big screen so that the buttons are bigger.  The only drawback is the lack of a camera flash, that I can see.  But it seems to take decent pictures, and the price is right!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Jessica Jones
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed my phone, nd I am glad I choose this phone, nd this provider!  It was here on time. Was packaged nd delivered n excellent shape!

Reviews.Title: Love my Lumia 521 Phone!
Reviews.Author: Gramsbear
Reviews.Content: I had to return the first Lumia 521 phone I received because the touch wouldn't work sometimes, but I was sent the return postage and received my new phone quickly. The second phone had to have a hard reset, but now it's great. I love it!  The sound quality is wonderful, the apps are great and the camera is magnificent!  The phone does not have a flash, but even if you take pictures in low light the camera will lighten the photo to make a great picture. Of course, outdoor photos are really great.  I have no complaints about this phone.  My daughter bought one and recommended it to me and now I bought another daughter one for Christmas.  We are all very pleased with the phones and don't know how we made it without them before!

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Ojas Maru
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone for its price. I was a Andriod phone user and now I am starting to like windows phone. They do have less apps but that does not mean its bad.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Samantha Austin
Reviews.Content: Loved the phone just wish it would stay charged properly. After 28 days it started to heat at the charging port. But overall I loved the phone.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Darthtaylor2002
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone, it is user friendly and has quite a bit of memory. It also has a fast processor.

Reviews.Title: cute phone
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Amankwah
Reviews.Content: i bought 2 same phone for my mum and uncle as a Christmas gift and they really loved it and enjoy usingit was a nice package for a gifti will recommend it anyone who needs a phone

Reviews.Title: My first smartphone
Reviews.Author: Pig Pen
Reviews.Content: I just got my 521 and have it up and running with a little help from Amazon customers. I am loving it. I have severe finger dexterity problems and can use this phone more easily than I could my geezer phone (aka Jitterbug). With a finger peck on the display I can take photos! So easy. I do need to use a stylus with the onscreen keyboard. The only disappointment I have is with the Windows Mobile operating system. I had hoped to be able to do file sharing, etc. with my computer Windows operating system using my home wifi network. Actually, Mobile Windows is very limited compared to the computer version. Based on my limited use this seems like a really great phone for the money. It cost me about $10 more than a replacement for my primitive, elementary Jitterbug. My "bug" died ofter about 2 years of use.

Reviews.Title: good value replacement phone
Reviews.Author: J. Ma
Reviews.Content: If you kid lose his phone once a year like mine, this is a great replacement phone.  It does everything you need and more. Good value.Clear displayfast CPUit would be best if it come with a better and front facing camera, but for the price, who's complaining

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone and Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Hans Garcia
Reviews.Content: Purchased the phone for my Grandmother and she simply loves it. The simplicity if the OS and the Nokia's amazing hardware is the perfect combination for a person who looking for a great simple phone.

Reviews.Title: Nokia Lumina 521
Reviews.Author: Tavon H.
Reviews.Content: I didn't know there was not a flash and front camera, but overall cool phone.���� I was really really satisfied.

Reviews.Title: NO complaints
Reviews.Author: J. Smith
Reviews.Content: Good phone, the windows operating system takes a little getting use to after using android and iOS for so long on other devices.  If you are connected to Hotmail and Xbox Live, this is certainly a good phone for you since they are all integrated.  It also has Windows Glass so you can control you Xbox with it.  Oh yeah, it also makes good phone calls and texts.

Reviews.Title: Works like a champ
Reviews.Author: dantheman
Reviews.Content: I came a cross this item and bought it as a trial.  After I received and used it, this item works like a champ.  Great price too.

Reviews.Title: I should have got this 2 years back and saved my self from the hassle of service contracts and monthly payments
Reviews.Author: Gautam G
Reviews.Content: I like the interface, and the smooth transitions between the pre-loaded apps. My main reason for downgrading from a Android to this one was trying to cut cost by switching service providers. I am not a big time smart phone user kinda guy, more of a user who just wants to have access to his emails, can text back n forth, look the weather, download some youtube music videos other than talk. that's it..no games..nothing. I don't think I need to pay a ton for a apple or a Samsung because they have better aesthetic. Those who like it, should grab them. I just want the stuff that I intend to use it for and this gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS PHONE!
Reviews.Author: Coffee Mom
Reviews.Content: This phone is great!  So easy to learn and use and it's got all the "bells and whistles" as more expensive smartphones!  I gave one to my teenager and he LOVES it!!!

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Leslie Wall
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for the money. It has all the bells and whistles of the more expensive smart phones without the cost. We have since bought one for our son and my husband is getting ready to purchase one as well.

Reviews.Title: Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Ainsley Cowell
Reviews.Content: I bought this for 69.99 :) that is a smashingly sweet price for a phone of this quality and functionality. Unfortunately the price has gone up but even at $75 it is still quite sweet. It is a bit bulky at the back and well suited for fans of windows 8.

Reviews.Title: thank you very much.
Reviews.Author: Jorge Iglesias
Reviews.Content: Im very glad with the product and it was at time that I was especting it. It was in a very good quality.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: TaLina Shindler
Reviews.Content: This is my first Windows phone, so I'm still getting used to it, and learning how to use it. I previously owned iPhones and Androids. Apps are not as readily available, that was the first thing I noticed! But so far, the phone is great. I haven't had any issues with it at all. It came with a sim card, but I took my old T-Mobile sim card, and cut it to fit. It immediately recognized it, and I didn't need to do any kind of activation. It doesn't have a flash for the camera, so keep that in mind if you use your camera a lot.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PHONE FOR THE MONEY..
Reviews.Author: Bruce Burkins
Reviews.Content: I cant find anything I dislike about it..Windows 8.. very sensitive and responsive..If there was one thing that was a little iffy it would be the battery life..tho Ive found if you make sure you put it to sleep soon as your done instead of let it do it on its own it helps..great Phone..

Reviews.Title: Worksfine
Reviews.Author: Rory
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone, would buy another and another. 4 g speed and apps are cool. Battery lasts all day.

Reviews.Title: it's what i expected one
Reviews.Author: menji  wu
Reviews.Content: It's applications are wonderful, compare the price with its quality, it's really worth. you can listen to the NOKIA music, GPS, NOKIA camera, the weather channel,yes , of coure internet......... anyway ,I like it. It's a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great phone.  Very fast shipment.
Reviews.Author: G. Louie
Reviews.Content: Phone came in 3 days and it works great  as an entry level phone.  Got it on sale, so with price and features, well worth it.  The port over was very easy and took only about 2 hours.

Reviews.Title: Tuff and neat
Reviews.Author: Patrick Gonzales "AmazonSwinger"
Reviews.Content: This phone is great bought for 19year old who seems break everything and has held up nicely... The new windows design is excellent and loves it but I wouldn't recommend it for apple users. The only thing it lacks is a front face cam for Skype but otherwise perfect for most social phone users.

Reviews.Title: Love my new phone
Reviews.Author: LIZBETH
Reviews.Content: For the price this phone is great!!!! It is actually better than expected. I just need some time to sit down and start playing with it to figure out all its applications.

Reviews.Title: This is an excellent camera and the package included a (no dollar value) activation micro-SIM
Reviews.Author: S. White
Reviews.Content: For the price this is an excellent phone. Read the other reviews for the details. I want to comment on what's included in the box as fulfilled by Fuzion Wireless.A/C charger - Cheep, but functionalVery short USB cable - about 2 inches longInstruction booklet - standard minimal information is a bunch of languages.*** Activation micro-SIM - you don't need to buy a separate T-Mobile activation SIM. ***Note: Activation SIM has no dollar value, but you can setup an account and put money on it (pre-paid), establish another account type i.e. monthly billing, or have your old pre-paid account/phone number moved over to the new SIM.I moved my account over from my old SIM and T-Mobile made that super easy. My money and old phone number are being used on the new phone now.

Reviews.Title: Working well - (GREAT!)
Reviews.Author: D. Richardson "D.R."
Reviews.Content: (update below)I moved from a high-end Android phone to this one. I was eager to move away from very expensive phones and was curious about Windows on the phone. It's very, very different than an Android phone and my initial reaction was negative. Android is a simpler OS (from a UI perspective).Two days into it, I'm liking this phone a lot. Getting used to Windows, and appreciate what it does. At first I was concerned about missing my apps. I got those replaced with Windows apps. I can't get the same apps and don't have the same number of choices, but they work just fine.I was also dismayed that this phone doesn't do USB tethering. What?!?!?! No tethering? How am I going to get a network connection from my phone. It has this "internet sharing" thing, which I begrudgingly tried. This feature is great! Much nicer than having to use a 3rd party app and a USB cable and fighting problems with those. It's things like this are making this phone attractive to me.So far this seems to be a great smartphone and I'm expecting to like it more than my Android phone - will give an update in a couple of weeks. For the price this seems like a great value.---------------------Couple of weeks later and I am really liking this phone. One caveat: it does not have the same number of apps. I'm missing one or two that were convenient to have. For me the number is that small. Otherwise, it's been great. The features are good - better than on my Android phone. The UI is different. Not better or worse than Android. This phone is a fantastic value.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: I don't know why I ever left windows phone for android in the first place!I love this phone ever so much!It's perfect! Everything you need in a phone.And moves and responses fast and quick.Definitely won't regret this phone!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous entry level smartphone
Reviews.Author: speedjohn
Reviews.Content: This phone is an absolute steal and a fabulous entry level smartphone for the money.  Nokia has always made solid hardware and the Windows phone platform will catch up quickly to iOS and Android.  The app store is inferior, but give it time and every major app will be offered on Windows Phones before time.  There's already versions of Instragram, snapchat, whatsapp, etc. if that's your thing.  As far as the phone goes, again for the money, this phone is great.  The OS is easy, I actually like the "tiles" and ability to customize it.  Good call clarity, messaging, fast internet, and best of all FREE MAPS - offline, meaning do data is used.  The only downsides would be no flash on camera or front facing camera either, but it does take decent pictures outside or in lighted areas.

Reviews.Title: Great Entry-level Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: R. Berry "becklaughs"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these phones- one for each of my parents (in mid-60's). Neither of them are tech savvy, but they had outgrown their basic phones. While I am not, personally, a fan of Windows phones, my parents LOVE this phone. The screen is bright, the audio clarity is amazing, and the over all user-interface is very friendly. I would recommend this phone for anyone who is shy about getting a smart phone, or even for those teens who want a smart phone w/out the ridiculous $600+ price tag. I would purchase from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: The best value out there.  You have found your phone.
Reviews.Author: Daniel R.
Reviews.Content: You can stop looking for a cell phone now, you've just found the best smartphone for $100.  Hell, it's better then some phones that cost $400-600!  The only thing this phone is missing is a flash for the camera that doubles as a flashlight, but that's one of the reason's they can offer it to you under the $100 price bracket.It's funny, I've been able to tell if someone else was also talking on a Lumia 521, they would sound very clear.  Speaking of clear, this phone has a clear reception and texting is great.I bought one for my wife about a week after I got mine for a work phone.  I have also considered getting it on my personal line, because it's much nicer and faster/less glitchy then my Galaxy S droid phone.

Reviews.Title: Good price but mine came with a defect
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Phone restarts out of nowhere once or twice a day. It has not happened speaking with someone but I will see it restart on its own.The phone is saving me a lot of money per year w/t-mobile so I can't complain too much. I don't need mobile data but it is nice to use wifi and pairing it up with my outlook account. I am unaware of any other major carrier that plays nicely with a smart phone without mobile data.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone!
Reviews.Author: metta
Reviews.Content: It's really good phone, which is easy to use and have fun with.Will recommend it to everyone. Thank you

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Luigi
Reviews.Content: The phone is absolutely amazing no doubts about it, the only problem I have with it is that the charger that came with it was not functional

Reviews.Title: Terrific Phone--you cannot lose.
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: Honestly, this phone is as good as any iPhone.  I like it better because it syncs with my Surface and Outlook Calendar everywhere instantly.  It also has voice to text recognition, panoramic camera, internet hot spot sharing, and so much more, and I bought it for 94.00.  I liked it so much I purchased 3 more for my children (teen age/college = SKEPTICAL) and they rave about it.

Reviews.Title: Nokia Lumia 512
Reviews.Author: Russell Taft
Reviews.Content: Received phone, my first and reluctant plunge into the smart phone arena.  Find it difficult to understand how people take their phones wherever they go as though they might miss something important.  I think it is an ego thing where people feel they are very important.  Surprise, they are not that important, in my opinion.  Non-the-less I now am enjoying learning the various capabilities of my 521, the latest today where I can play stored music on an FM station in my vehicle.  I especially like the ability to speak to create a text message as my thumbs do not handle keyboards well.  Voice activation of calls is also a wonderful feature.My phone usually stays in the vehicle because I don't think I'm that important to miss something whilst in a store or theater or wherever doing something.  I don't need to call anyone to find out which 6-pack of beer I need to buy.  Phone is a wonderful tool which I will use for my purposes and not be slaved to it.These comments have very little to do with the great features of the phone.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product for the money - 50 to 100$
Reviews.Author: San Antonio Sam
Reviews.Content: I am older and bought this amazingly cheap phone to become  familiar with smart phones and Windows 8.  It's a phone, its a wifi device for web surfing, a stand alone GPS device that can run offline from T-mobile (no minutes or MBytes used) and has voice recognition/ask it a question vs. keying it in.  It will identify songs playing on the radio within  a few seconds with name and group performing. Nokia provides a free music service offline as well.  I use it as a wifi device with no phone plan active.  It will do anything a $500 smart phone can do except it is missing a camera flash.To download free maps (HERE maps-very good), the phone went online (using WIFI hot spot)  to grab the maps I selected and install them.  Again, no connection to T-Mobile since no active account.  Very impressive.  Will it replace my flip phone?  Nope.  I want tactile keys for dialing. Will it replace my Garmin GPS?  Probably not.  More detail on dedicated Garmin GPS.  However, for an all in one device that you can carry in a shirt pocket, it is still impressive regardless of price. and this one is dirt cheap at under $100.  The microsoft store is obviously selling these at cost or below cost to build awareness of window o/s phones and to showcase Nokia phones now owned by Microsoft.  Grab one or two.  A great buying opportunity.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Pearlman "Kat"
Reviews.Content: This phone is exactly what Windows 8 looks like it was designed for. It's sleek, easy to maneuver, and the touch screen is easy to set to respond to your touch. I was afraid I wasn't going to like it, but I do love it now!

Reviews.Title: Better than my iphone
Reviews.Author: Lala N.
Reviews.Content: I just got this as a second phone and love it. What a great value! I have an iphone for my work phone and this phone does everything the iPhone does. Plus I like the interface and live tiles much better. I bought it at Best Buy for $70 and with the Tmobile $50 everything plan, this is a great deal if you don't want to spend a lot. Great phone, I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 521
Reviews.Author: John Wells
Reviews.Content: At the Amazon price, this is an amazing phone. I am a Chicago cab driver and people do get killed here for an I-Phone or lose them. Since, I have more modest needs, calls, texts, maps and some e-mail review, this is the perfect phone for me. Hey! I ;loved my BlackBerry. It is now relegated to alarm clock and camera. Back up.

Reviews.Title: Great for first smart phone
Reviews.Author: Debra Wolfarth
Reviews.Content: My first smart phone and I'm having so much fun!  It's especially easy for anyone already using a Windows operating system. The only problem I'm having is with the camera.  I would have liked a more in-depth tutorial.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: anesha thomas
Reviews.Content: Never had a window phone before, and I must say am impressed with its features, the screen is great, its not too heavy, had no problems with it , all I did was insert the sim card and my carrier did the rest, no problems with the battery, it was a bit challenging at first but after you got the hang of it, its very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: What a great deal
Reviews.Author: Trudy Patterson
Reviews.Content: I was a bit worried at first about this phone because I have had prepaid phones befor and they have turned out to be a pice of junk.  I got this one because it was the best choice for my budget.  I have had it for 3 days and its  a great phone.  Fast response time , great battery life, easy set up, fun apps.  My last phone was an iphone and I didnt expect the same performance from this one.  But I was impressed with what I got for $100.  Great job Nokia :)

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: MONG-RU LEE
Reviews.Content: The phone and Microsoft Windows phone version are great.  The GPS function (HERE) is better than my old Garmin.  I can find every App I need.  Great product for the money I paid.

Reviews.Title: Nice smart phone
Reviews.Author: Sramu
Reviews.Content: Nokia Lumia 521 is a nice smart phone. For the price, it is loaded with great features. To start with, I had problems with the phone as it would come-up with T-mobile and then no service. I went to T-mobile and they tried 2/3 sim cards, and none of them would solve the problem. T-mobile stores said it is the problem with the phone. I returned the phone to Amazon and got a replacement. I got the same problem in the replacement and T-mobile stores could not fix the problem. I researched the net and nobody had similar problem. Then I called T-mobile customer support and they found that the settings was the problem. I had set wi-fi calling as wi-fi only. It should be wi-fi preferred.Now I have been using the phone for about two weeks, I am extremely happy so far.The phone does not have a flash for camera and you cannot use it as a torch light.For the price, it is a great entry level smafrt phone.I have already ordered another phone for my wife.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Don J. Griffin II
Reviews.Content: Lots of helpful functions, easy to use (once you know how LOL) Glad I made this phone my choice. Windows 8 phone website is very helpful as well.

Reviews.Title: Impressed !
Reviews.Author: Suzanne
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. I bought it for my daughter as her first cell phone. The price is amazing for all you get with this phone! I own an iPhone but find myself playing with this phone all the time! Very impressed!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera. Smooth OS. 4G!  Great beginner smart phone!
Reviews.Author: jean barrera
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom as her first smart phone. And it's perfect!No complaints so far maybe the only thing is that there is no front facing cameraBut the rear camera is pretty good in low light even without flash. Obviously not the best but for the price it'll surprise you how great pictures look .The screen is pretty bright and the phone is pretty quick. This isn't an android phone so Windows doesn't need all that power to run smoothly.I currently have a rooted LG G2 and have had every other flagship phone and I'll tell you compared to what I spent for my phone this a deal!I had bought my dad a cheap galaxy phone on telcel (not the flagship phones)And that ran me $120 and now I regret not getting this phone for him as well

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: rsully660
Reviews.Content: i like mine got one for my daughter  she likes her to took alittle bit for me to figure it out. does have very good battery life

Reviews.Title: Such a great phone for so little money!
Reviews.Author: Cbo
Reviews.Content: I cant believe this a no contract phone.  I bought one for each of my kids and my mom too!  Easy to use and holds up well to daily use.  Microsoft and Nokia hit it out of the park with the OS and apps.  Offline maps, music, SkyDrive, auto picture uploads, etc...

Reviews.Title: . great value
Reviews.Author: Marco B.
Reviews.Content: I like the way the Windows is set up. It was an excellent value. Meets all my needs. I highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Gtishome
Reviews.Content: Can't beat it for the price, discover a gem.  Great camera, storage, music and maps.Would like a front facing camera but can't complain at this price.Would definitely recommend the Nokia Lumia 521

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: ben d'amico
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone regardless of the price.  When my $600 Windows phone breaks, I will replace it with this phone.  great

Reviews.Title: Very Goog
Reviews.Author: haroon rashid
Reviews.Content: I like the phone, More than my expectation. Price & quality is very good.Volume and charging are very good.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for a Tween
Reviews.Author: Nicole Hill
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my 12 year old for his first phone.  He did not want a windows phone, but really likes this one!

Reviews.Title: Truly the best phone in its class and then some!
Reviews.Author: HungryD "HungryD"
Reviews.Content: I am convinced that this phone is the greatest cell phone I've ever purchased. I've gotten 3 of them now for my family (a super steal at $80). I'd rather use this phone than my current iPhone 4, which is slow, inefficient and just worse than this Lumia. So many cool features that surprised me; when your friend calls, it reads out the contact name and tells you who's calling.  That's something even my iPhone doesn't have!  It's not just the price of this phone, it's their apps like Drive, which is an awesome GPS, and Nokia music, which allows you to download radio while at home or in a wifi spot and then listen to them without using your data while out & about.  Love this phone!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: TamiL
Reviews.Content: This windows phone is so easy to use. Even my anti-smart phone husband has figured it out. Despite his initial protests, he is now texting and serving the web, which is a miracle since all he wanted was a basic phone to use for calls only!  Hubby has customized his ringtones, lock screen, and the windows screen colors. VERY important- the price was better than the T-Mobile store's sale price. I have an iPhone, but I think the Nokia Lumia 521 is just as good and soooo much cheaper. Great starter smart phone.

Reviews.Author: Kasia
