Reviews.Title: Excellant value.
Reviews.Author: Scott Westendorf
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money.If you just want a simple very affordable cell phone that works really well,look no further,I'm certain you wont find a better deal.

Reviews.Title: First time Smartphone user.
Reviews.Author: philip rapisarda
Reviews.Content: It did exceed my expectations.  Packed with many goodies. Product is well made, and I like the no-contract feature. Learning process going forward.

Reviews.Title: Good value for a present
Reviews.Author: Arthur
Reviews.Content: She needed a new no frills phone and it works very well, but still getting used to the Windows O/S. Will recommend to someone who wants a value and is easy to please!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Rahat Zaidi
Reviews.Content: I got this great phone for a cheap price. It has everything I need. Has a great look, and camera results are awesome.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: cbuchmann
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice phone for the price you pay. It reacts to touch very nicely. I only wish it had a better camera.

Reviews.Title: GREAT value for a phone as smooth as an iPhone
Reviews.Author: B. Yamamoto
Reviews.Content: I have to post a little disclaimer before I get into the review, I'm a bit of a tech junkie and my primary phone is an iPhone 5S and before that was a nexus 4 (1.5 ghz quad core, running Android 4.3 - sold it before 4.4 Kit Kat was released), so my thoughts on the Lumia is compared to my past and current high end phones.That being said, the Lumia 521 has far exceeded my expectations!Software:The first thing that caught my attention was how surprisingly fluid this phone is for a 1 ghz dual core phone. It is more fluid than the nexus 4 and just as smooth as the iPhone 5S; it just goes to show how amazing the software is optimized. You would think this was a higher clocked quad core phone! The live tiles are pretty useful as I don't have to dig deep into apps to find info, like the weather for example. The customizability isn't as good as the Android platform but on par with iOS, because well, Apple doesn't let you change much unless you are jail broken. I believe the engineers for Microsoft is on par with Apple.Hardware:The Lumia 521 has a 1 ghz dual core Snapdragon S4 plus processor with 512 mb of RAM. It has lower end specs in the smartphone world but it doesn't show it when you're scrolling and going through different apps.Camera:First off, I use my iPhone for pictures, which is among the top two (Lumia 1020) so it further makes the 5 megapixel camera on this phone seem sub par, but takes decent photos in a well-lit environment, keyword: well-lit. That was one of the gripes I had with this phone, that it doesn't have a flash. The video cam takes 720p video and actually fares well. The Nokia Smart Cam takes a series of rapid fire photos and has features like best shot, remove moving object and change faces. The change faces feature is really useful. You can actually change just the face and keep the background the way it is in case someone blinked or like another smile better. Overall, it's just okay, nothing to write home about. Another thing it lacked was a front facing camera so if you video chat, you might want to look elsewhere.Apps:Yes, their App Store is pretty limited compared to iOS and Android. It does however has a lot of useful apps like Microsoft Office and the weather channel. I expect it to continue to grow as the popularity grows.Connectivity:One thing that this phone lacked that is fairly common in smartphones is LTE connectivity. It is limited to HSPA+ 21 which is plenty fast for web browsing. Hey, they had to cut corners somewhere for this price point.Battery:It has a relatively small 1430 mAh battery but the software is very well optimized for minimal battery usage. You can enable a battery saver feature that kicks in at around 30% charge. I easily got a full day out of it, 28 hours to be exact. Since the battery is small, it charges very fast, roughly 2, maybe 3 hours to fully charge.Overall:My overall impression is like mostly all of the reviews, a GREAT value. Probably the best bang for your buck in terms of lowest price (competes with the Nexus 5; 2.3 ghz quad core - but that's around $350) and I managed to nab one for $69.99. I gave this 4 stars for lack of LTE and a flash for the camera. This is a solid backup or a great phone for smartphone introduction and I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: My first smartphone
Reviews.Author: Lisa Garland
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  I was intimidated by it at first but now that I am used to it I love it!  It meets my needs

Reviews.Title: Excellent windows phone!
Reviews.Author: Whatscool "Uncle Peng"
Reviews.Content: Great phone, with great apps, great camera, great (and FREE) GPS, and ...I have Android phone and iPad. I love this Windows phone!

Reviews.Title: great  phone
Reviews.Author: kellie magness
Reviews.Content: great phone great price and t mobile is an awesome company.i would defiantly not go with their pre paid network no one speaks English. but post paid is awesome and is very good for anyone who has teenagers

Reviews.Title: Love this for the price speed and it is just simple to use! Wish it had a front facing camera!
Reviews.Author: BRMHAM
Reviews.Content: Feel great in the hand and it is just simple and easy to use the Windows Phone OS.  This great device works great as a phone as well with clear voice and strong Signal.  I wish it had a front facing camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Smart Phone...
Reviews.Author: KIT C.
Reviews.Content: Yes.. it's lock to T-mobile, but still a great window phone... it came with a SIM card (real small one), activated through T-mobile store, it perform flawlessly... the touch screen, and WIFI works great, the Battery lasted a long time (on Standby) not like my wife's Iphone.. even on standby it still drain the battery. Like it so much order another one, at $79...and take pretty decent pictures too.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: German1st
Reviews.Content: I am using this phone for a 6 month and this is one of the best phones I ever can think about.It has almost all functionality that most expensive i-phones and android phones has except flash and gyro-compass,.Excellent GPS/Navigation system with 3d and vehicle speed notification, tons of free apps that are available for speedy download, wifi calling,facebook, youtube, skype, viber, hotmail, yahoo, gmail and more mail boxes and many many more.Finally tiles that are incredibly useful and informative with pin/unpin options. And all this done in the phone that cost NOT $500+ but 70 dollars now(I did purchase it for 150)I am very strict to the items that purchasing and rarely rate them more then 3-4 stars, but this is exception for sure. I highly recommend this low budget smartphone for person who really needs functionality instead look cool. With regards

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the money
Reviews.Author: a jones
Reviews.Content: very good phone for the money its t-mobile but i used 2 different pre-paid sim cards in it just to see if it would worked and it did.

Reviews.Title: Amazing and affordable
Reviews.Author: Alexander Cornwell
Reviews.Content: This phone is straight up amazing! Fast, very little loading time, and affordable. I love mine and probably won't replace it for a VERY long time!

Reviews.Title: More apps!
Reviews.Author: Enoch Zhao
Reviews.Content: Everything is better than the price paid for!!!!In addition to $70 great price  + free $20 app voucher!One thing is that they need to have more of the mainstream apps. But I know it's coming!Great customer service Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great first phone
Reviews.Author: P. Martin
Reviews.Content: We broke down and decided to get a cell phone for our autistic teenager. This was inexpensive and is available with a great, cheap prepaid plan. He LOVES this phone. He texts my wife and me more now than he ever talked to us in the past. He loves that he can watch videos, play games, and surf the web. I love that all that isn't costing me an arm and a leg thanks to T-Mobile's $30 a month prepaid unlimited data and messaging plan with 100 minutes of talk.The only downside, for me, was that I had a heck of a time setting some of the features up for him. It took me well over an hour to figure out how to accept the terms of service for the Microsoft store. If you're buying it for yourself, and you're over 18, it might not be as involved. But I had to set up a family account in my name on windowsphone.com and add him as a user and THEN accept the TOS on his behalf. I've just been spoiled by Apple's "it just works" ecosystem.All-in-all I can definitely recommend this phone for anyone - not just surly teenagers.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Great phone, fast and reasonably priced. My best smart phone so far with many apps available. I am even able to watch TV on this phone with a super clear picture.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic phone for the money
Reviews.Author: 2007pony
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my wife and teenage son for Christmas and am in love with it.PROS:Best value that I found for following Apps:  Phone, Text, email, Internet Access, MapsIt is six times less expensive than super phones like iPhone 5c and is many times better than my Blackberry Torch.Its web browser is really fastIt has WiFi phone calling in addition to T MobileEasy to use. Adjustable size screen iconsEasy to import existing contacts via online Windows Live accountCONS:None known for our App needs as listed in the PROs comments.  I can't comment about entertainment apps (games, music, TV, movies) because we don't use them

Reviews.Title: killer price
Reviews.Author: Michael Khoury
Reviews.Content: good phone & great price love the display so I got another for another family memberwould recommend to a friend

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price! Loved it.
Reviews.Author: eCosto
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price! Loved it. Planning moving my iphone4  stuff to this phone, hope it can take most of them if not all.

Reviews.Title: First smart phone
Reviews.Author: star gazer
Reviews.Content: I've never had one and I need a lot of technical help, which has been provided.  I still have questions, but am confident the information is out there and I will be assisted.  I have changed plans a couple of times due to not understanding the plans.  The $2.00 or $3.00 a day plan is apparently not what it appears, even after asking questions at a local quiosk.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone
Reviews.Author: cartero
Reviews.Content: The only con so far has been the ability to sync Google calendar.  As far as windows...  Love it!!  The phone is quick and works perfect!  Would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: bought for my 68 year old mother
Reviews.Author: Ziyang
Reviews.Content: She likes it, enough features for her, and no complaints so far.  Good value for the price, thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: nikki halper
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife at Christmas. This is her first smartphone. It has been fairly easy to learn and she really loves it.

Reviews.Title: It Be Good
Reviews.Author: Ismael Flores
Reviews.Content: The phone is great, it came in it's original packaging, unopened and is very easy to setup you're info. It's has everything you should expect from a smartphone. You can personalize the tiles and change the colors, the only problem with the phone is the camera has no flash or front camera so you have to take a picture with the perfect lighting, but the phone has pre-installed photo editing software that fixes most lighting to a certain extent.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE !
Reviews.Author: Chris Wagner
Reviews.Content: My first smart phone.  I like the windows phone since it is so easy to synch with my computer.  I liked this phone so much that I bought 2 more  -  my wife and my daughter  and I all teach each other the features. It is a great phone for the money.

Reviews.Title: A very good phone
Reviews.Author: Raymond
Reviews.Content: I got the phone for only 99 dollars Target to replace my old Android phone(T Mobile Concord).  I wasn't expecting much out of this phone except for average daily use, but after several months using this phone, I can tell you the experience is surprising pleasant.  The phone has a rather large screen that renders high quality pictures, videos and texts alike.  Its processor is fast and quite responsive to touch.  The phone's interface was very easy to get used to and installation/removal of apps was a snap.  As for the phone build quality, I couldn't recommend it enough.  It's the most reliable smart phone I have ever used.  No instance of freeze up, hang up, or forced shut down for several months I have using this phone.  A dedicated button for its 5 Megapixel camera is also very convenience.  For a 99 dollars phone, its camera alone is worth the price.  Web browsing on 4G is amazing, loading web pages, photos, and streaming video are equally fast on the phone thanks to it fast processors.  Call quality is quite decent, most of my calls on this phone were quite clear.  There are some drawbacks, such as few apps are available for windows platform, its hard plastic cover is not comfortable to hold, and it only has three preset brightness levels.  Then again there attributes were easily ignored once I have gotten used to many of its wonderful functions.  For a phone of this quality it is a highly recommended buy.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for first smartphone.
Reviews.Author: Michele
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my teenager and so far we are pleased. The only problem that we have found is that it will not send picture texts (maybe because we are not paying for data, we only use the wifi). We are very pleased with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Maochu Luo
Reviews.Content: Best smartphone deal for t-mobile users.I was using Nokia Nuron 5230 and this is an upgrade. Just called T-mobile and tell them you need to upgrade your phone. The whole process takes about 5 minutes

Reviews.Title: Nokia Lumia 521
Reviews.Author: Jay "Jay"
Reviews.Content: I had bought a used/new phone and it worked well. I did have some questions and when i emailed the seller he was very helpful, very patient, and not rude at all. I gave the phone away as a gift and the person who has it now loves it!. and wouldn't trade it for any other phone. Although my family member has the phone and completely dislikes it, its all up to the way you like your phones. its much different from Samsung and a lot of people confuse that. I personaly think its a good phone, has good qualities, and was sold for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Absolute Value for Money
Reviews.Author: S. Sharma
Reviews.Content: Got it for $69.99. This is my first windows phone. My wife has an android and the first thing we did was the compare the features of the operating systems. I can say with pride there were hardly any instances where I felt let down. Ofcourse there are more Apss for Android but the smoothness and fuildity of WP cannot be matched by Android.Love it. !!!

Reviews.Title: A good phone
Reviews.Author: O-nest
Reviews.Content: If you need a smartphone to check/send emails, basic web browsing, GPS. This is the best phone in this price. If you love your apps on iOS or Android its not time yet to switch to Windows Phone.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: cheap and does the trick. if you looking for something to use for a short period. also an awesome gift

Reviews.Title: It is a good basic & inexpensive phone. Battery lasts for couple days with wifi on.
Reviews.Author: datman
Reviews.Content: If you need a phone just for texting, make phone calls, and the internet browsing, this will be a good inexpensive phone. Battery lasts for couple days with the wifi on.

Reviews.Title: It's a good phone and good system. For calling and texting is very cheap.
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: This phone is good with this price. I live it so much. Just for T mobile . They do not have a lot of places can use 4G only at big cities.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone, love kid mode
Reviews.Author: J. L. Martinez "Jaylyne"
Reviews.Content: The reviews for this phone (and the great Amazon price of seventy nine!) convinced me to purchase it in order to test drive pre-paid service. This phone is super easy to use out of the box. I've had several devices (old winmo, several iterations of android devices, apple devices) and I was surprised at how much I like this interface. I especially like the kid mode. You can set up the kid mode so they have their own little log in swipe screen and their own color palate. You decide which apps and games and whatnot is displayed in their area. I had a little trouble getting the service connected, but I think that's because we played with the phone for a while before we put in the sim card. One quick call to T-mobile support and I was up and running. We chose the prepaid 100 minute plan with unlimited text and data which is a steal at thirty a month. I really am pleased with this zippy windows phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Martinez
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone to have if you're looking for something to just make calls and watch videos. I was surprise of how loud the speakers got when I first got it. I really enjoyed this phone and plan to make it last for at least a year before thinking of switching.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 521 is a winner!
Reviews.Author: Norm Wilkie
Reviews.Content: I had  previously purchased a Nokia 521 for use in the Solavei cellular network. It is very user friendly and has functioned superbly. Purchased 2 more for people joining the Solavei network. Everyone's happy!

Reviews.Title: Affordable Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much from this phone since previous Nokia models weren't up to par. I was pleasantly surprised by how lightweight it was, along with the screen and sound quality. The thing I was concerned about the most was battery life. Many previous phones (all rather crappy smartphones or regular phones) of mine couldn't last through half a day without needing a full recharge. I turned on 'Battery Saver' all the time, and the most I've lasted (without games, much internet, etc.) is 6 days. While I don't use smartphones for much gaming, internet surfing or social media, I'll definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a quality, affordable smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Operating System, Fast Phone
Reviews.Author: honestreviews
Reviews.Content: The Windows 8 operating system is leaps and bounds better than the iPhone ios or Android Google based system. This phone is fast and efficient. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: great!!!
Reviews.Author: Q
Reviews.Content: Great value with 4g speed and windows ops. No contract. High resolution screen....shop around for better price outhere. Amazon does not always have the best price.

Reviews.Title: Very Price Effective
Reviews.Author: A.B.C.D.
Reviews.Content: It is very price effective. The only non-serious issue is the storage capacity (8GB). With the HERE Brive Map downloaded, there is hardly any more enough space for your apps.  I will recommend to friends

Reviews.Title: very good quality phone
Reviews.Author: seasebrina
Reviews.Content: With this price, it is a very good quality phone. I had Samsung 3 for myself and got this one for husband. I tested and used it first after it came by downloading all different apps. It is different to Android, but I think it has its own advantage. So far I like it. I bought screen protector and phone back cover as suggested by Amazaon. They are very good.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap phone and I do mean amazing !
Reviews.Author: Christopher E. Runyon
Reviews.Content: My friend needed a good phone for under 100 no contract . So I dug around and I read reviews or this phone and watched some youtube reviews . This phone got a lot of great praise so I took a chance and purchased 3 for her family . What can I say this little low spec phone can keep up with the big boys in most ways . It might not have the bells and whistles of an iphone 5s but honestly for everyday use I cannot tell the difference .Pluses :**The phone has amazing web browsing speed . .**Probably by far the best  5 mega pixel phone you will ever see ...I mean it takes GREAT photos ! I have a nexus 5 myself and I cannot tell the difference honestly and my friend has a iphone 5s and no difference either .**Great and I do mean great screen for the price ...looks higher res then it is .**Now the best feature on this phone is the sound quality ...It's amazing ..it's better then nexus 5 and a hell of a lot better then Iphone 5s I don't know how they got such amazing sound in a sub 100$ phone but wow !**Plays just about any game out there at good frame rates .Im not gonna list any downsides because this is a sub 100 phone and it has ZERO for that price range . If you need a great quality cheap no contract phone I am telling you ...this is a winner . Btw one came that would not charge and I returned it no problem to amazon and got a replacement phone even before I had shipped the broken one ...kudos amazon !

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Anup Gadgil
Reviews.Content: Great mid level smartphone. There are enough apps for commonly used features. Build quality, battery performance and screen are as per expectation.Note that the camera does not have a built in flash. So indoor photos are average quality.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Phone
Reviews.Author: CriticizeK
Reviews.Content: this is a really good phone it has a very loud speaker and it is easy to use i love the apps and i don't ever want to leave it!!!:)

Reviews.Title: satisifed...
Reviews.Author: Rajashekar
Reviews.Content: Like the phone, I received what I ordered for...but was expecting ear phones with it...but fine...received on time...best phone in that price...

Reviews.Title: It is a great product
Reviews.Author: spaghettisauceJP
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive smart phone and works great! This is an introductory phone for my 12 years son. This is his first smart phone. It was a great buy for a young teenager.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: mac
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for the price. I haven't had any problems with it. I got it as a gift.  The sound is good. Takes great pictures and videos.  Easy to download info to it.  When I first got it... I said to myself I will never get the hang of this phone because I'm not really a tech person but I was wrong.  This phone is so easy to use and I would definitely recommend it. My only issue is the battery life isn't that great so take your charger with you. LOL

Reviews.Title: Great Phone in this price
Reviews.Author: Rahul
Reviews.Content: I am not a cell phone freak. So I went for it as it was cheap. Now here is the rest of the things which I noticed1-  The touch is excellent2- Windows interface is quite good. but yes some application crashes quite often.3- Not many applications as compared to android or ios4- Camera is the biggest selling point. Its awesome. Its really awesome. Sharp and with focus feature pictures come really good. You can also download some apps to enhance the shooting experience.5- Look wise it is beautiful.6- Battery is same as of all smart phones7- Display is really good.8- Phone is fast with 1 Ghz processor and 512 ram. No lag on games and all.9- Speakers are another USP of nokia. Loud and clear.Verdict: If you are a light user and don't care about gazillions of apps. Go for it. It is value of money.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Madame
Reviews.Content: Great reception, intuitive and user friendly. Touch screen is easier to manage than expected. I also like being able to change view size, and to open docs. Sound is fine, and headphones are of standard size, but are not included.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Timothy G.
Reviews.Content: No problem with this ordered love the phone. Also would recomend it to all who love the smartphone. I will be getting another phone from them real soon

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Denise J. Cushman
Reviews.Content: nice phone, had to get used to it. There is definitely a learning curve with it, but I am getting used to it and loving it more everyday.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Nomis Anep
Reviews.Content: Its a good product for the less than $100 dollars I paid. There are some limitations to the phone but as a started or a back up phone it's great!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: Love it! Works well with my simple mobile account. It's a fun new upgrade for me especially for the price! The only thing is that there isn't a front facing camera but still great!

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Brianna414
Reviews.Content: Had my phone for almost 3 weeks the screen is very large and classy I would say fot it to be the prices its at its worth  only small down fall as you all know there aren't as many apps as android that's why I gave it a 4 other wise everything else is good.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: will
Reviews.Content: best phone out there for 80, windows 8 works great on it, really fast no lag at all. the sound could be a little louder but it is only 80, the size is perfect imo, iphone is too small, galaxy is little too big.

Reviews.Title: Best phone Ever!
Reviews.Author: khadra mohamed
Reviews.Content: Am soo in love with this phone, mashallah it's the best of All.....Fits ur hand perfectly n it's soo Darn Cute!!

Reviews.Title: Nice little phone
Reviews.Author: Bill Stout
Reviews.Content: Until recently - Moto G - cheap off-contract phones were hard to find.  If your needs are modest - this is a nice phone.  I used it as a daily driver for awhile and it's capable enough for entry level users.

Reviews.Title: alot for ya buck
Reviews.Author: rahming89
Reviews.Content: One of the best phone that I've had in a long time that's tough (falling to the ground) it gives alot for ya buck I'm tired of spending hundreds of dollars on new phones when every 6 months they got a new one for hundreds of dollars that does the same thing as the cheap phone's and thank God Microsoft made this product cheap and available  to the 100 -150 dollar range for people like me lol. But um I get to control the Xbox and the rest so I won't complain love it. I actually got rid of my s4 for a windows phone because of the smart glass app . Thank you amazon thank you Microsoft.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Stacey O'Brien
Reviews.Content: This phone is beyond everything that I had hoped for, and it is a great price as well! Seems to be nearly as functional as the iPhone, yet MUCH cheaper!

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone, cheap price
Reviews.Author: E. Lo
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone, cheap price. Phone feels very sturdy, well built. Note that it does not have a front facing camera nor does it have a flash, but what did you expect for this price.

Reviews.Title: Great budget phone
Reviews.Author: Timothy R. Walker
Reviews.Content: This phone runs great with the Windows Phone 8 OS despite the budget hardware powering it. Fewer apps than iOS or android but more built in features than what I ever had with an android device. Love the Family room feature especially for syncing notes and lists without a separate app. If you are looking at a getting an off contract windows this is definitely it unless you need the better camera on the 925.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Hernan M.
Reviews.Content: I bought like a gift for a friend so far has been working good. time will tell no more to say

Reviews.Title: This is the phone to buy
Reviews.Author: Jeneen D.
Reviews.Content: If you want to get a young person in your life a great phone at a reasonable price, this is the phone to get. Cost me just over $87 and that is with tax. Never could I have gotten an Android or IOS device of this quality for this price. Yes, it has some drawbacks, but none related to the performance of the device. No, the camera isn't the best and few other perks have been left out, but this phone is fast, doesn't freeze up and can gets major compliments when people see it. The Windows app store isn't as robust as the IOS  and Android stores, but it has the basics and my son is very happy with his new gift.

Reviews.Title: No Contest
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: This is the best budget phone out there period! I researched tons of phones in the budget category and in this price range nothing even came close. The screen is bright and crisp. The battery lasts all day unless you game heavy. Speakers are clear and have plenty of volume. The camera is pretty good to boot. Now to cover the bad points. Reception in buildings can be pretty bad. Now this could be the cellular coverage in my area. This phone does not have an led flash or NFC but again this is aimed at the budget market. The app store is still growing but I think it has plenty for my needs. This is just a great phone!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amelia Thompson
Reviews.Content: I have had all type of phones, but I'm in love with my Nokia. Try it and they'll see :)

Reviews.Title: amazingly high quality especially at this price
Reviews.Author: Gadgester "No Time, No Money"
Reviews.Content: I didn't like T-Mobile but wanted to keep my old number without going through porting, so I went with this as a prepaid phone. It's really nice. The white shell can be changed easily. The screen is quite nice, way better than the screens you get on similarly priced Android phones. The system is easy to use and very fast, never crashes. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Cool, Fast Phone...
Reviews.Author: Melisha "Melisha Bryant"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the phone for my 13 year old twins, I sort of wish I would have ordered it for myself,  okay not really. But its a cool phone anyway. I think its better, and faster than an android phone, no it is faster. We're on the T-Mobile network and a rep tried to tell me not to get the phone because the kids couldn't download their apps they like, like Face Book, Instagram, AngryBird.. You know kid stuff  But this is untrue.. They can still download the apps but instead of utilizing TMobile marketplace. They get the games from Windows instead. If you are going to buy this phone it's better to purchase it from Amazon or Ebay or something like that. I purchased 2 phones for like $76.00 a piece. tmobile is selling this phone for like $150.00. I hear Walmart sells the phone but not the Walmart by me but I hear their selling it for over 150.00

Reviews.Title: Excellent Deal
Reviews.Author: LadyLibra "LL"
Reviews.Content: Phones arrived in good condition with no problems at all. Activation was a simple process, I expected some headaches but everything was okay.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone at an unbelievable price.
Reviews.Author: K. Gupta "kk"
Reviews.Content: This phone does 90% or more of what you would get from a iPhone or Galaxy phone at a fraction of price ($80 vs $600) with no contract. Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable value
Reviews.Author: granger
Reviews.Content: I wanted to cut my phone bill and try Tmobile and this was just the cheapest smartphone -so I thought I'd give it a try. At $80 I'm even in just two months time from the savings to my cell phone bill. So if I hated the phone no big deal. Well its working great. The phone is lagfree and easy to navigate and not that big of a learning curve from my Android phones of the past. I may even like it more. I was able to transfer my phone number but evidently the website for activation doesn't do much error checking and I ended up talking to about 5 people to get it worked out. But they were all friendly and the process ultimately worked.All of my Google contacts and emails transferred effortlessly.

Reviews.Title: Great phone (if you have the right expectations)
Reviews.Author: Dr Phill
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is well designed. It screen sensitivity, the placement of controls etc are good. The back cover does seem cheap, but that's what you're buying.Windows platform is reasonably fine as well. There are some irritating aspects where Microsoft wants you to have a windows based PC, an online account and the linkages are sort of "hard set". So, for example it would be very hard to have two people share a PC but have two separate windows phones. Besides some of these quirks, it's actually fairly stable and easy to use.Finally, the apps are just not there. If you like all the different apps available in a typical iPhone or Android, a windows phone is not for you (at least yet).I simply bought this phone with my t-mobile prepaid plan and upgraded from a simple voice only phone. I kept my plan (for which I pay about $100 a year), and only use the internet through WiFi. Even then I only use simple things like email, some web browsing, twitter and facebook at home. All of those things work fine, and you just can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly competent for under $100
Reviews.Author: John D Wilkinson
Reviews.Content: This phone is easily worth $200, maybe even $300. I bought this phone as a cheap smartphone for my mother-in-law, but ended up keeping it for myself. It has actually replaced my Samsung Galaxy S4 as my daily carry phone. After using iOS and Android devices for years, this Windows phone really surprised me. Don't kid yourself, Windows Phone doesn't yet have the variety of apps that iOS or Android has, but it has the basics, and even without any apps, it has what you need, including Facebook and Twitter integrated into the OS, maps, local business search and recommendations, etc. It works far more smoothly than any of my Android phones did, which always felt half-baked, even as I loved the seemingly infinite configurability. While a $100 phone certainly has some limitations, in terms of storage, crispness of the display, and the camera, this phone is far better than its price would indicate. It has me seriously considering upgrading to another Lumia some day, but I think this little phone will stay in my pocket for a while.

Reviews.Title: Best deal...except battery
Reviews.Author: Orgil Ulziikhutag "Oogii"
Reviews.Content: Very good deal. Arrived on time. Packaging was good. It even came with micro-SIM card. I'm facing only one problem. The battery is draining veeeery quickly. On the best review (I don't remember the name of that customer) that man said about app named culprit was draining the battery very quickly and he deleted that app and battery problem solved. But I can't find any app like that on my phone. If anyone knows how to find that just let me know pls.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: James L Bloodworth
Reviews.Content: Great phone takes a little time to get use to as any new phone does but works great I love this phone

Reviews.Title: Nokia lumia 521
Reviews.Author: A. Perez "ladybug"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this phone.  I love the 4G speed and the smooth flow of the windows 8 os on it.  I love the size, it's larger than my last phone, a tmobile prism, but not too big.  It gets good reception and the sound is perfect.  Love all the features and the large variety of ring tones and setting options.

Reviews.Title: A low price for a device thats worth tons more.
Reviews.Author: Ameer
Reviews.Content: Didnt think i was going to fall in love with a low smartphone but given the cheap price, it was too easy to give up!I upgraded from the 710 on t-mobile and this is a great replacement. Windows phone 8 has all the major apps you would want and the list of apps keeps growing day by day. (PS. we do have instagram, vine and snapchat app in the store)

Reviews.Title: Nokia got it right!
Reviews.Author: Mike MacInnes
Reviews.Content: Fantastic phone. I also use an iPhone 5s, this is by far a better phone all around. Also the Windows OS is much better than iOS.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for everyday use!
Reviews.Author: Patrick Blahnik
Reviews.Content: I chose 4 stars, because the phone is a bit complicated. But I, so far have no complaints! The phone is fast, clear (even daylight)!, very user friendly, and effective with whatever use you have for it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Loralee Ahmu
Reviews.Content: Its a really good phone for only 150$ but if someone else is paying part of it for you its not a big deal. It loads fast for everything which is nice when your in a hurry. It gives tons of starting apps that are fun to play around with, it's easy to figure out how to work it. It has really long battery life so you don't have to charge every few hours and recharges quickly too so that is good. Some bad things about it though is you have to wait a little until it gets a signal which might get frustrating. Also when I tried to download a app it didn't let me and I can't even download any apps at all which is sad.

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE IS THE BOMB.
Reviews.Author: Mariana
Reviews.Content: I'll just keep it simple. No weird talk of dual hertz blah blah or 5 MPG.Let me just say at the price, its an amazing phone. The internet is super fast! Its super easy to use. The only con would be that it doesn't support portrait lock, but maybe that won't be a problem for you :) great great phone.

Reviews.Title: Very Good and Affordable Product.
Reviews.Author: usman
Reviews.Content: It is a very good smart phone. If you are looking for an affordable one, nokia is on top with this Model.Pros:Cheap, Good Call Quality, Offline Maps for navigation, Nokia Music, Good GPS, Good sound QualityCons:Not much ! except the casing, it would be great if the casing had been of metal but you can't get a metal casing in the price that you are paying haha

Reviews.Title: Dont let the price deceive you
Reviews.Author: ashton anderson
Reviews.Content: A nice phone for an extremely good price, everything you need in a phone without a $700 price tag .

Reviews.Title: For the price, it's very impressive little device
Reviews.Author: Maurice Alexander
Reviews.Content: For the price, this phone really offer exceptional quality, I've dropped this phone twice (heart ache) and I was surprise it did not break! (Just a small bump) The touch screen is super sensitive (way more than my 2nd generation iPad 2), a nice loud speaker and a impressive 5MP camera (the only bad this is the shutter speed, some photos can be blurry, you would need to play with the exposure and ISO settings) and the Windows Phone 8 operative system is fantastic, If you're not really centre in having billions of apps, then give WP 8 a chance. This is my first windows phone device and I'm totally upgrading to a Nokia Lumia 925 next year!

Reviews.Title: good phonr
Reviews.Author: nicole z
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because my last phone stopped holding a charge. I really like it would b perfect if it had a camera in the front. Other than that it works perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Usman Basha
Reviews.Content: I wanted a phone which should be great in these 3 features and this phone is awesome in all of them1. Music: plays well and clarity is good at high volumes too. Better than many low end androids that I used. Not as good as my Iphone or S3, If I rate Iphone and S3 as 100 and 96 then this would be a 85: as good as my BB Bold2. Browsing: phone is good in this department as well. S3 is only better because it has a larger screen  and the super sensitive touch is great, 4" screen is large enough for convenient browsing.3. GPS: I think this phone beats all others hands down. You can have offline maps, just download  US maps which is about 2.5GB by connecting to WiFi and you are good to go. You don't need data for navigating. But might need data to search something on the map, u can try and avoid that too. If you don't have data plan then look for points of interest and navigate.So far am loving the phone, people who are looking for gaming and high end photography might be disappointed and there's no front camera for video call or Skype. but its a great phone for $80 (I bought  it on hsn)Windows 8 tiles is impressive too, so far I have no complainsI would highly recommend this phone for anyone who would like to give a try to windows phones.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice for First Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: Ng
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone.  I absolutely love this phone.  It is very reliable.  The features are great.  It was probably the biggest bang for the buck on the market.For an entry level phone, I'm glad I chose this one.What I like:mp3 playerpodcast subscriptionmap featuregood texting featureInternet browser easy to useFree apps that are availableWhat I don't like:Public transit feature is not that good

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Josmar
Reviews.Content: Wonderful smart phone.. I had the iPhone and galaxy and this phone compares to them really well for the price

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive phone!!
Reviews.Author: D. Richardson "thegirliestgirl"
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to buy this phone because I'm not a fan of Microsoft, but the Lumia 521 appeared to be my best alternative after my phone suddenly died on me a couple of weeks ago while out of town.  As others have said, the phone is packed with features, which is totally surprising at this price point.  I downloaded quite a bit of music and podcasts and have only used my 5th Gen IPod a couple of times since my purchase, because this works so well.Pros:- Intuitive and responsive screen- Great storage, and expandable to 64 Gb- Good music player- There appear to be quite a few apps, including free ones (don't have much use for many apps)Cons:- I'm not a fan of the screen colors (maybe there's a way to change it?)- I searched for several hours online and there doesn't seem to be a way to connect my phone directly to my car like my IPod does.  I know I can use a line in cord, but I still nipped a star for it, because it's ridiculous that Microsoft hasn't done this for Windows smart phones.  I spend hours in my car every week listening to music and catching up on the many podcasts I listen to.  Hopefully, they will fix this soon.Review edited to add note:  this phone uses micro sim and micro SD cards.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Rail Rat
Reviews.Content: I just wanted everyone to know how awesome this phone is.I just switched from an Android to this Lumia 521.I love the UI, the live tiles are an excellent feature, and the screenIs very responsive, the power saving features are excellent. IWent to work with a full charge and used my Bluetooth headphonesFor my entire 10hr shift and only drained a 1/4 of the battery!The T-mobile versions 4g is faster than my home internet.Now for some of the down side:  MS has the system locked downSo you don't have the freedom that comes with an android asFar as tweaking the system. Also, not as many apps but that's becauseTheir apps work, unlike android that allows anyone to make an app that barely works.That is pretty much it. I hope you like it as much as I do

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the money
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Most people will consider the Lumia 521 for its price, but it's a very competent phone at any price point.  The body can feel a bit cheap, but you won't notice it for a moment if you're putting it in an aftermarket phone case.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: M. Hone
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome! I love the windows environment!  It's easy to use and efficient. My husband has an android phone and would trade it for my phone in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: Buy it, you will love it!
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Great phone for a great price and one of the easiest phones I've ever used. Love the voice to text, saves a huge amount of time.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone and Great price
Reviews.Author: Tete H Nsougan
Reviews.Content: It was a good buy price wise and features that the phone offer. It is a good phone for an average user.

Reviews.Title: windows 8 phones works really well
Reviews.Author: buys a lot of amazon stuff "ecs"
Reviews.Content: its not android! finally away from those greedy claws way too much weirdness with android now..im glad microsoft stepped it up

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Cross Juergens
Reviews.Content: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!! I can't believe this is so cheap it runs really well. Doesn't have a flash or front facing camera but I don't care. I had a windows 7 phone and just now upgraded to a windows 8. It is great for anyone who has an xbox or uses all microsoft stuff. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a smart phone. Let me say I was blown away by how loud the speakers are.

Reviews.Title: Good so far
Reviews.Author: Honest Reviewer
Reviews.Content: my first impressions are that i like it and its an advancement over my samsung smartphone. however, my GF seems to think this an old phone just b/c of the design, but its not.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: My World "GBJCC"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! Probably the best windows phone I've ever had. Definitely much better than our Android phone. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Solid phone.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A great phone for a great price. It has everything I wanted in a smart phone: maps, Facebook, texting, phone calls are clear, and the browser is fast enough for when I need to google an address. I wish the plastic back had different covers I could change it to, though.

Reviews.Title: Great buy love it I would recommend  it
Reviews.Author: Cameasy
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my 13 year old she loves it Great buy love it I would recommend  Nokia Lumia 521

Reviews.Title: Great little phone for a low price.
Reviews.Author: C.Feldmann
Reviews.Content: When the phone came it includes a SIM card(If the product listing mentioned that I didn't see it and bought a separate one). Popped in the sim and went to T-Mobile.com/activation and chose their 30/mo unlimited web and text, 100min talk plan. simple. no other charges. The phone is snappy and looks cool, feels good to use. I am still getting used to the Windows phone OS but for a good cheap phone its been great. I watch some videos I put on it from my computer, and some music I have stored on it now also.

Reviews.Title: Cant beat this phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: S. Romano
Reviews.Content: This phone is very user friendly, simple, intuitive OS. Everything works very nicely smooth and responsive. No glitches. I would give it 5+ stars but I dont think the battery is all that great. Though you can learn how to work with it.

Reviews.Title: Nokia Lumia 521 Works Great! On simple mobile!!!
Reviews.Author: AMS
Reviews.Content: Just got the new T-mobile Lumia 521 for $95 from Amazon. Set up was easy. The hardest part was having to cut my existing full size sim card down to the new micro sim size ( but I found very useful videos on YouTube uses at your own risk) after that I inserted the card FIRST then let it boot up and do the first time set up and I was good to go!!!!! I can make calls get texts and pictures text.  So happy with this phone!! got Twitter, 6tag (instagram) and facebook and kik messenger working great never going back to Android!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: Jim Harris
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, especially for this price point. I wasn't too sure about the Windows OS but after using now for about 6 weeks it exceeded my expectations. From a hardware standpoint the phone works well. Calls are clear, it handles whatever I want it to do it on the web, social media, youtube, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great phone - great price...
Reviews.Author: Alan Prouty
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for a great price.  Hooked right into our T-Mobile account.  I was worried at first about the plastic casing from the factory, but we added a cover and screen protector and not so worried about it breaking now with the added protection.  I just couldn't be any more pleased for a good, entry level phone that has a lot of cool stuff as well...  hen you consider that most phones are inexplicably pricier than a nice laptop - this is a great value...

Reviews.Title: Reliable and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: A. Marrero ":)"
Reviews.Content: Works well and it is easy to use with the Windows 8 GUI.  Very reasonable pricing, not the iPhone madness.

Reviews.Title: Great value smartphone
Reviews.Author: Nicholas G. Rupp
Reviews.Content: Phone works well. Shipment arrived quickly. this is a basic smart phone. doesn't have all of the apps that the iPhone or Samsung offer, but it's price less than $100 makes it a great initial smart phone. great value.

Reviews.Title: verry nice phone. will suggest to all my friends
Reviews.Author: Timur B. Tuychiev
Reviews.Content: i love this phone, already came with updated software (windows 8 amber) . this model have everything you need for dayli basis.only pros is no front camera and no flashlight.

Reviews.Title: SOMETHING NEW
Reviews.Author: Shatia Gladden
Reviews.Content: GREAT BATTERY LIFE  LIGHTWEIGHTSOUND IS GREAT  GREAT SIZEDURABLE  DONT FREEZEEASY TO UNDERSTANDPICTURE QUALITYFAST DOWNLOADSSTORAGE

Reviews.Title: Idiot proof great product
Reviews.Author: Stephen R. Strom "Luau_King_Kauai"
Reviews.Content: Product was very reasonable and for even the most technologically challenged, it can be managed. Great deal for under 100 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Great phone with an awesome price that exceeds expectations.
Reviews.Author: Rick K Kim
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my father and so far he is loving it. Makes me want to purchase one for myself.EDIT: 12/17/2013- After seeing my father use it for a while I have to say it is a nice phone for the price still, but compared to an android OS the interface seems a little cluttered and to navigate through the menu settings gets a bit tedious.- Dropped the rating down a star.

Reviews.Title: Has its quirks but I still love this phone
Reviews.Author: kbass0001
Reviews.Content: I used to have an iPhone and wanted something different and what most people didn't have. It was easy to figure out. PROS: Good battery life. Love live tiles to save on home screen. Very user friendly. Great HD Camera. Has Microsoft Office makes its easy to open documents in emails CONS: Cannot turn off text message preview on phone Alarm doesn't work when phone is turned off; alarm sound based on sound level - if low/off, you won't hear it. I want to turn off sound for text messages and other sounds while sleeping but would like the alarm to still sound off. This was one great iPhone feature Cannot turn off the calendar preview. Shows day of appts on display screen with time and date (I'm a very private person so if I step away from my phone, people can see text message previews and my calendar with phone being locked#. Some apps not featured on windows phone #such as Instagram, Facebook pages app; YouTube - Facebook app is ok)

Reviews.Title: Weening off the Nokia N9 ain't as bad as i thought but I gotta move on... (Sniff Sniff)
Reviews.Author: Pancho V.
Reviews.Content: I'm streaming the music from my Windows 8 Laptop to my phone when im out and about. The system itself is fluid as hell. The ringtone situation should allow me to used songs i have but i just got the phone so im still kinking the bugs out. but all-in-all its a Great phone. I mean C'mon, ITs A NOKIA B****! NUFF SAID!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Gerard R. Poitras "Jerr"
Reviews.Content: I received this for my birthday. I really hated texting and thought I would never use it. I just love that it is so easy to use and its a comfortable fit in my hand. It does everything I need and more. I have become a believer. This is a great phone for the money and the shipping was great.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: MCR
Reviews.Content: Good phone, easy to use.  Simple internet access and calling options.  The associates at theT-Mobile store near my home were very helpful in transferring my contacts.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Kelly smith
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone hope they have more later I buy them for gifts and my friends love when they get one

Reviews.Title: "good cheap" phone
Reviews.Author: G. Deras "pressure productions"
Reviews.Content: love it for the price. still waiting for apps to catch up with android. no front facing camera if you are a skyper

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: kenyajen
Reviews.Content: This phone is great. I love the camera on this phone. It works great. The phone is not too big and is light. I love this phone.

Reviews.Title: First Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Frederick N. Mayer
Reviews.Content: Ok this is a new experience just went from a flip phone to smartphone. Easy to use, WiFi calling works and is a great feature. Phone does all I need and has enough apps for anything I need as well.

Reviews.Title: Nokia Lumia 521
Reviews.Author: John L. Keown
Reviews.Content: This Windows phone is reasonably priced, and is bought without the requirement of a contract with T-Mobile.If you want phone minutes without a data plan, you can opt for that. Then use Wi-Fi for data where available. This makes the Nokia Lumia a great device at a good price. You will love it too!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME PHONE CHEAP PRICE
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the price..similar to an android with may cools apps and also very up to date. I most definitely recommend this phone for anyone on a budget

Reviews.Title: Good replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Chris A. Ruhl "C Ruhl"
Reviews.Content: After I washed my old phone I decided to get a new one and since I had purchased a touch screen laptop it seemed a good move to get a windows phone.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS PHONE SO MUCH!
Reviews.Author: Doreen
Reviews.Content: It shipped very fast. I got this phone in 3 days. The phone is very neat and has a very attractive interface. It's easy and simple to use.

Reviews.Title: NOKIA LUMIA 521
Reviews.Author: Beverly Garner
Reviews.Content: I LIKE IT STILL TRYING TO LEARN IT, WITHOUT THE BOOK IT IS HARD, THE BOOK WOULD HELP,  IT IS OK.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, but...
Reviews.Author: Interesting 69
Reviews.Content: Great phone, but the camera doesn't have a flash and without the battery save mode, the battery goes flat within a day.  Also within 2 month's use, the phone blacked out completely.  Could not revived it and finally had to resort to removing the battery, sim chip and reinstalling everything.  Crossing my fingers that this was the last of having it completely shut down!

Reviews.Title: Lumia 521
Reviews.Author: elkman
Reviews.Content: Nice phone. Battery life got better as it was used. Smooth slide and touch screen. I made a good choice here.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: Came on timeWorks greatCamera is goodWould recommend it to anyone who is looking for am inexpensive phone and great resultsVery happy I got it

Reviews.Title: it's good!
Reviews.Author: Quy Giap
Reviews.Content: a only draw back is lock phone; it's very hard to unlock this phone if you did not purchase from T-Mobile.  Otherwise, it's very good for beginner to use a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: This phone is great, even though it doesn't come with the many apps the android phones do! We like it!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone....camera a bit slow to capture photos
Reviews.Author: Mike J. Smith "smithy737"
Reviews.Content: Once you get used to window operating system from Android and iPhone.....its pretty goodCamera takes to long to take pictures......not instant....

Reviews.Title: Great phone for even greater price deal!
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Meir
Reviews.Content: Me and my kids love the phone.  And the price could not be beat.  My girls are thrilled.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: I love my new phone
Reviews.Author: Sandra J
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It's my first smart phone. I had a flip phone for years and I decided it time to upgrade. And I did not want to spend a lot of money. I am happy with my choice. It has so many features. My brother needed a new phone so I ordered one for him too. He also loves it. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa Simon
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 14 year old son.  Works great for him, he loves the phone.  Very easy to work with.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price, sound is good, photo options are good, look and feel is great, ringtones are beautiful. Finding the f
Reviews.Author: Gary A Rowe
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the price, sound is good, photo options are good, look and feel is great, ringtones are beautiful

Reviews.Title: windows phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: this is my first go-round with a windows phone, and so far, its been a pleasant experience. I have talked to a lot of people that complain that ALL windows phones are not user friendly. I reply "Do you have a windows 7/8 computer?" Its set-up is very similar to that. I found it quite easy to use. I just wish it had a better camera like the new Nokia phones. Or at least a flash. But for the price, simply awesome

Reviews.Title: Real "bang for the buck"
Reviews.Author: NomDePlume
Reviews.Content: It's a little early in the game to really tell, but the machine worked from the word "go" and it is downright responsive.  It does what I want done and stays out of the way.  It appears to be real "bang for the buck".  Windows 8 works well in this environment.  The only drawback is the T-Mobile experience, but I was expecting that.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone.
Reviews.Author: Sarath
Reviews.Content: My first Windows phone. I love this phone. Thanks to Nokia, T-Mobile, Microsoft and Amazon for designing and developing and bringing this product to market. Excellent device for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: Angela M. Alvarado
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for all three of my kids, ages ranging from 10 - 18 and it was easy to use.  Best inexpensive smartphone out there.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: nikkluvbug
Reviews.Content: I love this phone it is everything I wanted and more.I haven't had it long but I'm very pleased with the product. I only wish I could download music for free but there is the Nokia radio and that's pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: Got mine at a TMobile Store
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: 1st one had an issue within 24 hours. TMobile just handed me a replacement after activating and swapping my simm.  Its been flawless. I love it. And love the windows 8 os, and I generally hate MS.

Reviews.Title: completely in love
Reviews.Author: sonya mitchell
Reviews.Content: a very nice phone, shipped and delivered on time. It is everything I expected and more. It is easy to use and maintains a charge for a long time.

Reviews.Title: So Choice
Reviews.Author: Sawyer Vaughn
Reviews.Content: I am v happy with this phone. My pc is Windows 8 so I knew what I was getting into with this phone. I am so glad I could pay under $200 for a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: jill j stebbins
Reviews.Content: It's the best phone for the money. I'm loving it. No flash for the camera but I can live without that.

Reviews.Title: Excllent Phone, I'm having fun with it
Reviews.Author: C. Gradis "Loving my Kindle Fire"
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone, it is fast, easy to use and has most of the apps that I want. The best thing about this phone is the price. All of the other smart phones that I looked at with similar features were at least $100 more if not four or five hundred more.  I have an android pad and would have rather had an android phone but for the money I am thrilled that I bought this phone.One of the keys to enjoying this phone is to take the time the time to setup your home screen tiles properly. If you hold your finger on a tile it will allow you to modify the tile, you can change the size, the location and add and delete tiles from your home page. I like to have all of my tiles display on one page so I removed everything I don't use and shrunk most of them to fit on one page. The tiles I left large are those that can display information in the tile like the weather channel and my photographs.  I have added a screen protector and a protective case to the phone. It looks and feels great. Thanks Nokia and T-mobile for making smart phones affordable.

Reviews.Title: Great phone and better Nokia Add Ons
Reviews.Author: Fernando Diaz
Reviews.Content: This wont be another blunder of a cheap phone purchase , will be durable, sturdy, functional, fast, right size and beautiful too.Nokia Drive and maps, giving you GPS driving directions included in the OS is unbeatable, lots of Nokia add ons also.Nows if you want 1 billion useless apps to waste your life in them go buy a droid, in the price range is like comparing a Yugo with a Mercedes, you wont be able to do much with a $100 Android in apps anyway, but with the Lumia 521 you get your money's worth till the last penny.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Allen V. Jayme
Reviews.Content: For the price paid, this is a great phone to test out to determine if a Windows phone is right for you.  I bought this phone as a back up for my iPhone 5 (in case I lose/break it). No LTE but that doesn't bother me.  Overall this is a great entry level smartphone.  All MS has to do is get more apps to be competitive.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone for the Price
Reviews.Author: Dionne Ashley
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time. This phone is is very nice. lots of bells and whistle. It's way more advance than the phone I previously had. So I am still learning how to operate it. I have used it as a mp3 to listen to music. I also take lots of picturs,  the only problem I have had is that there is no flash. Social media, bluetooth, GPS  all good. Maybe I will update once I have learned more about it. But overall it was a very good deal for me, more than I actually need.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Phone, Need to spend $$ for maps
Reviews.Author: Sailing Guy "Steve"
Reviews.Content: It is a very good phone for the price. The only issue is that the advertisement on the Microsoft Store states,"The Nokia Lumia 521 is a premium 4G smartphone at a great price. It includes apps like HERE Maps, which features true offline maps for 94 countries, and HERE Drive, free voice-guided navigation."In fact, I am in USA and there I am only able to use Here Drive map for USA country. Canada not even included. For other countries, you have to pay an extra $19.95 (1/4 of the cost of the phone). I had at least expected Canada to be available as is the case for most stand-alone GPS navigators.The advertisement/description on Microsoft Store website is somewhat MISLEADING, in my view. I would recommend to Microsoft to fix this ASAP to indicate that only the USA map works for USA customers (your region only).

Reviews.Title: Great gift for my dad!
Reviews.Author: Jesse P. Jocson "Skinnyflip"
Reviews.Content: My dad is technologically challenged. His previous phone was dropped in water when fishing. When I first got it for him he didn't use it as much. After having created his very own facebook and email account, he's using his phone much more. Browsing through the phone feels as responsive as my Lumia 1020, taking pictures of course isn't as great as the Lumia 1020 but it does produce clear pictures, and the screen is really vibrant. The user interface is really simplistic and user friendly, but still my dad would still ask how to do certain functions on the phone here and there. My only regret was not purchasing two of these phones when they were on sale for $54.99 during Christmas. For anyone who wants a cheap phone quality phone, then this is the phone you want.

Reviews.Title: I expected a $70 phone to be crappy. This phone is not crappy
Reviews.Author: Anon
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of this phone.I purchased it mainly to see how the Windows Phone OS worked.I expected a $70 phone to be crappy. This phone is not crappy.The UI was extremely smooth (I almost like it more than the Android / IPhone approach). The browsing was fast.If the phone supported device encryption, I could totally see myself using it as my daily device.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Sujit Smile
Reviews.Content: I am not a big fan of the Andriod phone, thought its fragile :)This one has exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great Smartphone for Pay as you Go
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great smartphone for people who want to save money and think paying $80.00/month for unlimited everything is a sinful waste of money. ;) This phone was $69.99 when I got it a few days ago here. I had a flip phone with T Mobile, mostly for emergencies and rare phone calls. Sure, I didn't really NEED a smartphone, but dragging my nine inch android tablet places wasn't all that convenient (and made me feel kinda dorky, frankly). I like that I can check my mail and my Facebook, do a little surfing, scan QR codes, play a few games, use the free nokia mixradio, use the calendar, use the free here maps which have turn by turn even without a connection...you know, do stuff that all the really expensive phones do and maybe some they don't. Oh, and you tube and videos look surprisingly good on this little phone!I refuse to pay an arm and a leg for data, so I will be using only WiFi for that. Many places I go to have it for free, including my workplace...which I of course only access at break time... I also get somewhat sketchy cell service at my house, so WiFi calling may come in handy, although we do still have a landline (which also costs an arm and a leg but that's another issue).A note about notifying T Mobile about my new phone: there was absolutely no pressure put on me to buy a data plan; in fact they didn't even mention it! Color me shocked...I was only disappointed that I could not take care of it online, as pay as you go customers were instructed on the website to call to update a new Sim card onto their account, so I feared a sales pitch.My husband now wants one of these, too...easier than carrying around his iPad mini, but tons less expensive than buying an iPhone.So, is it worth the money and am I satisfied? You betcha! And now I know how to work android, iOS, and windows on all different kinds of devices.Looking forward, too, to the WP 8.1 update coming soon. It just keeps getting better, and I will admit to feeling a bit smug and self-justified with my purchase. :)Try it; you'll like it, and if you don't, you only spent under a hundred dollars.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for a smart phone
Reviews.Author: JL
Reviews.Content: Great price, and like the phone overall. A few things I would change:1. Email set up - If i am setting up my imap and POP accounts I should be able to edit the new account I am setting up if incoming / outgoing servers not correct or there are other corrections needed. Instead you have to start the set up process all over again.2. Lighted navigation buttons.3. Front facing camera.4. Longer battery life. If you use navigation or surf the web battery can be gone in less than half a day with nominal use.Like the windows interface but takes awhile to get use to. Overall a very good phone for the money.

Reviews.Title: If your an Android of iPhone user, you will be Amazed at what a sub-$100 phone can do!  Best Dollar to feature phone out there!
Reviews.Author: Computer Dan from AC, NJ
Reviews.Content: The Nokia Lumia 520/521 is seriously the best Dollar to Feature smartphone available -- Hint:  Why do you think Google is trying to push for their own $50 phone - they are trying to compete in this market!  (You can find this phone for $50 every once in a while on sale - just be patient ... if you can :) ) ....I personally have gone through so many generations of iPhone and Android phones (HTC and Samsung) that I actually got this phone to use as a 'throw away' phone.  You know, a pre-paid $30 per month phone that I wouldn't care if it got banged up a bit.Now this is the only phone I use, period.  What makes it so great?  The Operating System.  Yeah, I know ... Your saying the same thing I said 'yeah, right' ... but its True.. its just works, its fast and the ability to PIN anything from anywhere INSIDE of a program is awesome.PIN TILESThe PIN thing:  For instance. the people I contact frequently EACH have their own tile right on the home screen - Each webpage (like amazon.com) I frequent has its own tile right on the home screen ... Each band (or down the song) or playlist has ITS OWN tile.. all RESIZABLE and easily prepositional ...NAVIGATIONNokia HERE maps - Nokia really went out of their way to make this FREE GPS MAP system great.  Free traffic, etc - everything you expect from Google Maps - but somehow prettier ...CHEAP PRE-PAID (Auto-pay if you want) PLANS$30 a month for UNLIMITED data (5GB 4G unthrottled, 3G 100% unthrottled), UNLIMITED TXT msgs, 100 Mins in Voice time ($.10/min after that) ... The 100 Mins  kind of made me thing a bit about it... I haven't reached that limit yet - Partly because the WIFI calling works GREAT - Leaps and bounds better than it did with any previous phone (although last time I tried WIFI calling it was about 5 years ago) ...I did NOT get this phone on Amazon.com - I picked it up from BEST BUY, right off the shelf for $80.If you want the $30 a month DO NOT activate the phone at BEST BUY.  Do it from T-MOBILE.com - just grab the phone and check out.. For some reason the $30 month deal is only valid through T-MOBILE.com.  Its super easy if you can read instructions... and maybe even if you cant :) ...BATTERY LIFEThe battery life on this phone is so far the best out of any other smartphone I've had.  I usually leave WIFI on all the time and I usually charge it once every 3 days or so ... I do watch videos, listen to music, etc - so its probably being used as an average smartphone would be.CAMERAThere is NO front facing camera on this phone... so If you HAVE to take perfect selfies, you may want to upgrade to the next Lumia ...STORE APPSI think major companies are finally realizing how fast Windows 8 Phones are growing in market shares - There are apps popping in all the time... Wanna check to see if you app will be on there before you invest your $100 in a phone?  [...]PROFESSIONAL's BEST BUYMicrosoft OFFICE - ONE DRIVE (skydrive) all built right in ... all designed to work right out of the box...COLLEGE STUDENTS BEST BUY (see PROFESIONALS BEST BUY + FB, Instagram, Twitter, etc all available as one would expect) ...SUMMERY - No one now-a-days has $600 to throw away on a device... Take $50-$100 - own your phone outright, which will allow you to go with any carrier that it supports (frequency wise) and don't get tied down with $100+ monthly cell phone bills... that's just insane that I once did just that... never AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: GregO
Reviews.Content: I'll admit if your not used to the Windows interface its a little tricky at first but you get used to it. I love this phone. It is an awesome buy and definitely worth the money. The Pros more than out weigh the Cons. :D

Reviews.Title: Great Phone for Price
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for a cheap new smart phone for T-mobile. This phone has all the features I need! It's hard to find a great phone for a college student budget.Pros:PriceFunctionaliltyLight weight4GConnects to windows 8.1 account on laptopCons:Camera (Not the best I've had)Limited Apps (Not a big problem for me though)Seems easy to break (I'm buying a heavy duty cover for it because I'm clumsy)

Reviews.Title: Feature Packed Phone for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Always Samsung "ravereviews"

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2NF7FWODNX90VcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2NF7FWODNX90VcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 2:29 MinsThis is a feature packed phone for the price. For under one hundred dollars, users get a great smart phone on a great network and in addition, no one is locked down to a two year contract. I tried to cover as much as i could in the video review, but due to file size limitations, i maxed out if i exceed a three minute video review. I am a huge Windows OS fan. I think their OS is great and offers users a different experience. It is NOT the most exciting OS out there, but at the same time, it is a very solid OS and runs very smoothly. It is not a battery hog or glitchy like the Android OS. My pros and cons are below. I know my cons list might be a bit long, but remember that you are getting a lot for the price. Feel free to ask me any questions and i'll be happy to respond.Pros:- Price (A smartphone under one hundred dollars and no contract)- T-Mobile network- 4G (HSPA Plus Network no 4G LTE)- Built in Wi-Fi- Mobile HotSport Feature- T-Mobile's awesome affordable plans- Wi-Fi Calling- Windows OS- Features packed smart phone for the price- LCD display (LCD is brighter than AMOLED displays)Cons:- No HD display- Display is 4 inches (5.2 inches would be perfect)- No front facing camera for video chats- A larger battery- Not a 13 megapixel camera- No flash on the camera- No Starbucks or Hangouts App yet

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my 17 year old self.
Reviews.Author: Zax Beard "Zax"
Reviews.Content: Man was I stoked when I recieved this phone today. I bought in on the 12th and got in in the mail around 2 todaY. My first impression was on its size. its about the size of an iphone 5. and about as thick too. I compared it to my moms iphone 4 and it totally wins with the sound and fast high speed connection. Ive been skeptyical on Windows 8, but Im actually really enjoying this phone. its customizable page and apps make it easy to use and access your everyday apps. People say this is a basic phone, and yes it is, a basic SMARTPHONE. This hass all the features of a iphone 5 and galaxy s4, except its nokia with windows 8. I highly reccomend this product, and for the price if all you get is a basic plan, thats ok. All of nokias apps are free to use and acess without service or wifi. Although one feature is call through wifi. great phone. Best one ive ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone at great price. Worth it for offline navigation alone.
Reviews.Author: Romwell
Reviews.Content: My #1 reason for purchasing this phone is that you can download maps for the whole world and use them without even inserting the SIM card. Flying in the airplane and tracking its position on the screen, comparing the map to what's outside the window is something you can do on Nokia 521 out of the box (and can't easily do on most other phones).Yes, navigation works in offline/airplane mode, without the data connection. You need to insert the SIM card to activate Nokia Drive, but after that you can just use WiFi to download maps for the whole world, one country with one button press. Navigation software is easy to use and see if you place the phone on the dashboard; extra data speed limit is displayed, and text-to-speech for street names is available in English at the very least (haven't checked other languages).Aside from that, Windows 8 is surprisingly nice and easy to use. Many of the good things come from the OS itself. Now Microsoft, Nokia and Skype are one company, so all the products place well with each other. If you have Windows 8 installed, you will be familiar with the Metro UI; while I am still unsure about it on the desktop, it definitely works well on the phone, providing fast access to all features and settings. It is quite minimalistic, but does what is required of it.Hardware-wise, this phone is fast; everything loads just the way it should. Touch screen is sensitive and precise, can use it with fingernails; multi-touch is supported, of course. You can share the 4G connection over Wi-Fi in two seconds; or you can use your home Wi-Fi.Battery lasts a day with (my) average usage if you turn on the battery saver mode (prevents live tiles from updating automatically, which I don't use anyway). The phone is using the same BL-5J battery as my old Nokia 5230 Nuron (that I am upgrading from).Overall, I am more than happy with the phone. I bought it for the maps and WiFi hotspot functionality, but now I often use it to check email and make skype calls/chat conversations instead of pulling out my old netbook. Calendar and facebook/google integration are also very nice. Nokia photos apps (panorama, cinemagraph) are a nice touch as well.On the downside, there are not as many applications on the market as there are for Android; this is changing for the better, though (I will probably contribute an app: student dev licenses are free). Also, I am not sure I like they way files are managed on the phone (apparently, this is similar to iOS): for instance, if there's no app to open a file extension, IE will not save it to the memory/sd card. There are third party apps that remedy this to some extent, but I have found that many apps rely on Skydrive to store and access files, which is silly (what if there's no signal?) and costly (in terms of data and battery). However, with my usage, this is not yet a problem.I would generally recommend it to anyone, especially if working offline navigation is a desirable feature.SUMMARYPROS: completely offline navigation, WiFi hotspot, Windows 8, simple, fastCONS: not too many apps yet, Windows 8 way of dealing with files is too restrictive, battery life is average.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly capable phone .
Reviews.Author: txmail
Reviews.Content: The screen on this thing is not viewable in the sun, and the material the screen is made of attracts smudges like no other material I know - but at the end of it all it is a very capable phone. I used it on a trip to California as my primary and had no problems with Navigation, web, phone or messaging. The app market is pretty limited but all the important stuff is there. The apps for the camera are pretty cool, but the camera is from 1999 and terrible at taking pictures. If you are looking for a phone to use as a phone / messaging device then you have a winner with the bonus of a pretty good navigation maps that will even work offline. Oh - the hot spot feature on this phone is the most solid "hot spot" I have ever used. It's a simple on / off and everything was able to connect with no problems and at good speeds. Five stars because I don't think any other smart phone in this price range comes close to the feature set (and capability) of this Windows 8 phone.

Reviews.Title: fantastic low cost quality phone
Reviews.Author: K. Herbert
Reviews.Content: Great phone - better than IOS or Android!  Despite what all the nay-sayers proclaim this phone is the best for the price.  It is a full featured Windows Phone with Outlook - Facebook - XBOX Games etc.  it has a nice camera and WIFI with cloud storage.  Easy transfer of your address book from other phones!  Quality build, we bought a second of these and have not experienced any problems in several months.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: Logan Nowak
Reviews.Content: Moved to this from an 8X when I jumped from AT&T; to T-Mobile. Aside from the lack of flash, this phone does everything as good as or better than my 8X.
